note.p: Landowner and surgeon. Married Jane Mary Hazelwood of Anwick in 1833. Of Anwick, Lincolnshire, in 1834. Owned extensive property there with his wife.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/681/1/10/15/16
Lincolnshire Record Office (Lincs RO HIG/4/2/3/5 and HIG/4/2/3/6)
UK, poll books and electoral registers, 1538–1893 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 September 2019)
